titleStmt.title: Resolved upon the question, by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that this commission of array for Leycester is against law, and against the liberties and property of the subject ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and first 3 lines of text.
At head of title: Die Sabbathi, viz. 18. Junij. 1642.
"Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that the abovesaid votes shall be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne, cleric: Parliamentorum."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
